name: Mandrill Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Mandrill Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Mandrill API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Mandrill API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message
available_options: Message (值: message) - Send a message

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: sendTemplate
available_options: Send Template (值: sendTemplate) - Send message based on template
Send HTML (值: sendHtml) - Send message based on HTML

template.name: template
template.description: The template you want to send. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
template.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template Name or ID | 作用: The template you want to send. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

fromEmail.name: fromEmail
fromEmail.description: Email address of the sender optional with name
fromEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Email | 作用: Email address of the sender optional with name | (必填项)

toEmail.name: toEmail
toEmail.description: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
toEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Email | 作用: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma. | (必填项)

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: async (值: None) - Whether to enable a background sending mode that is optimized for bulk sending. In async mode, messages/send will immediately return a status of "queued" for every recipient. To handle rejections when sending in async mode, set up a webhook for the 'reject' event. Defaults to false for messages with no more than 10 recipients; messages with more than 10 recipients are always sent asynchronously, regardless of the value of async.
autoText (值: None) - Whether or not to automatically generate a text part for messages that are not given text
autoHtml (值: None) - Whether or not to automatically generate an HTML part for messages that are not given HTML
bccAddress (值: None) - An optional address to receive an exact copy of each recipient's email
fromName (值: None) - Optional from name to be used
googleAnalyticsCampaign (值: None) - Optional string indicating the value to set for the utm_campaign tracking parameter. If this isn't provided the email's from address will be used instead.

googleAnalyticsDomains (值: None) - An array of strings separated by a comma (,) indicating for which any matching URLs will automatically have Google Analytics parameters appended to their query string automatically
html (值: None) - The html you want to send
important (值: None) - Whether or not this message is important, and should be delivered ahead of non-important messages
inlineCss (值: None) - Whether or not to automatically inline all CSS styles provided in the message HTML - only for HTML documents less than 256KB in size

ipPool (值: None) - The name of the dedicated ip pool that should be used to send the message. If you do not have any dedicated IPs, this parameter has no effect. If you specify a pool that does not exist, your default pool will be used instead.
preserveRecipients (值: None) - Whether or not to expose all recipients in to "To" header for each email
returnPathDomain (值: None) - A custom domain to use for the messages's return-path

sendAt (值: None) - When this message should be sent as a UTC timestamp in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format. If you specify a time in the past, the message will be sent immediately. An additional fee applies for scheduled email, and this feature is only available to accounts with a positive balance.
signingDomain (值: None) - A custom domain to use for SPF/DKIM signing instead of mandrill(for "via" or "on behalf of" in email clients)
subAccount (值: None) - The unique ID of a subaccount for this message - must already exist or will fail with an error
subject (值: None) - Subject line of the email

tags (值: None) - An array of string separated by a comma (,) to tag the message with. Stats are accumulated using tags, though we only store the first 100 we see, so this should not be unique or change frequently. Tags should be 50 characters or less. Any tags starting with an underscore are reserved for internal use and will cause errors.
text (值: None) - Example text content
trackClicks (值: None) - Whether or not to turn on click tracking for the message
trackOpens (值: None) - Whether or not to turn on open tracking for the message
trackingDomain (值: None) - A custom domain to use for tracking opens and clicks instead of mandrillapp.com
urlStripQs (值: None) - Whether or not to strip the query string from URLs when aggregating tracked URL data
viewContentLink (值: None) - Whether to remove content logging for sensitive emails

mergeVarsJson.name: mergeVarsJson
mergeVarsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Merge Vars | 作用: Global merge variables

mergeVarsUi.name: mergeVarsUi
mergeVarsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Merge Vars | 作用: Per-recipient merge variables | 默认值: {}
available_options: mergeVarsValues (值: None)

metadataUi.name: metadataUi
metadataUi.description: Metadata an associative array of user metadata. Mandrill will store this metadata and make it available for retrieval. In addition, you can select up to 10 metadata fields to index and make searchable using the Mandrill search api.
metadataUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Metadata | 作用: Metadata an associative array of user metadata. Mandrill will store this metadata and make it available for retrieval. In addition, you can select up to 10 metadata fields to index and make searchable using the Mandrill search api. | 默认值: {}
available_options: metadataValues (值: None)

metadataJson.name: metadataJson
metadataJson.description: Metadata an associative array of user metadata. Mandrill will store this metadata and make it available for retrieval. In addition, you can select up to 10 metadata fields to index and make searchable using the Mandrill search api.
metadataJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Metadata | 作用: Metadata an associative array of user metadata. Mandrill will store this metadata and make it available for retrieval. In addition, you can select up to 10 metadata fields to index and make searchable using the Mandrill search api.

attachmentsJson.name: attachmentsJson
attachmentsJson.description: An array of supported attachments to add to the message
attachmentsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments | 作用: An array of supported attachments to add to the message

attachmentsUi.name: attachmentsUi
attachmentsUi.description: Array of supported attachments to add to the message
attachmentsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments | 作用: Array of supported attachments to add to the message | 默认值: {}
available_options: attachmentsValues (值: None)
attachmentsBinary (值: None)

headersJson.name: headersJson
headersJson.description: Optional extra headers to add to the message (most headers are allowed)
headersJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Headers | 作用: Optional extra headers to add to the message (most headers are allowed)

headersUi.name: headersUi
headersUi.description: Optional extra headers to add to the message (most headers are allowed)
headersUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Headers | 作用: Optional extra headers to add to the message (most headers are allowed) | 默认值: {}
available_options: headersValues (值: None)
